trans-unit.target: Ryokosan.com, the social network to plan activity and share your holidays
Ryokosan is a social network to find travel buddies around you or your destinations. Share your holidays, meet people and live enriching adventures.
How are we different from others ?
Share your holidays, organize activities and meet people, find a travel companion around you or your destinations.

In terms of platforms to meet other travellers, most of the time you have to choice between platforms Hybrid whose real purpose is to sell you something like organized trips or others that are available in a single language, available only to women, their social network seems inactive for several years, some are forums not optimized for meet travellers. You are here because it doesn't matter if you are planning an activity in your country or on the other side of the world; you want to meet other travel buddies. And because it's not always easy. We're here to help you reach your goal without detour.

You are a student, you are looking for a rewarding experience to add to your CV and you have even minimal skills in Javascript, css or languages. Contact us via our social networks or via the contact form we have a mission for you.
Contact your favorite members, according to your preferences and discuss your project.
Add your activity and increase your chances of finding a travel companion who shares the same project as you.
Update your activity and increase your chances of finding a travel companion who shares the same project as you.
Ryokosan Messaging is the instant messaging service integrated into the Ryokosan platform. This messaging system allows you to exchange with other members.
Create a new conversation and start chatting with our other members.
Ryokosan is very easy to use. You just need to create an account. A moderator will check your profile within 24 hours. Then show who you are add a profile photo that suits you.

We consider that each profile is important, choose who you want to meet according to your project and your expectations (destination, date, age, gender) or add an activity in a few minutes and start chatting. Then come back and give your opinion on our networks. Also subscribe to our newsletter to be aware of the latest profile added.

You want to meet fellow travelers and live unforgettable adventures, that's why several times a year we organize free meetings all over the globe. You choose the destination via our social networks. This year we went to Thailand and South Korea.

Access our members profiles and start chatting with them for free without hidden fees and browse our platform without third-party advertising because in ryokosan we think its significantly affect your experience.

Whether you want to hike in your country or travel to the other side of the world. Chat with whoever you want, first send a message, a photo or a flash to start communicating with our members. (video calls coming soon).

All our profiles are validated by email and verified via manual moderation by our moderators. A certification process is in place for suspicious profiles. You can report them to us via the contact form.

I am Chris the creator of ryokosan and I started on this platform in 2022, at which time I came out of a difficult period following the loss of a loved one a few years ago. I wanted to make my first trip simbolizing a new start but I realized that it is sometimes difficult to find people around you with the same availability as you. Not finding a platform to my liking, I created ryokosan, a human platform that shares the co-travel putting the profiles of each one forward, as much as the destination.
Why tell you this story because behind ryokosan there is a human team with values and experiences.

Ryokosan is a European platform that allows you to meet other people regardless of their nationality with the same desires as you In terms of travel and activities. Our concept is halfway between a social network and a dating site, in fact it makes it possible to match profiles according to their destinations, geolocation, interest, age, gender, which is still more efficient than a forum where you post a little of everything and anything. Ryokosan is also a free site, without any subscription where each profile is verified and we will not influence you to sell you organized trips, you are free. You can browse quietly without advertising and your data belongs to you, you keep them! The team is young between 19 and 26 years old, dynamic and active on the networks. Co-traveling is a way of traveling that has existed for millennia, we are not going to pretend to reinvent the wheel, but we hope to bring you directly to your goal.
For any questions, contact the Ryokosan team: contact@ryokosan.com
